pr_title: ensure all published artifacts have a groupId

timeline.message: ensure all published artifacts have a groupId

timeline.bodyText:
I think ok to put directly into javaagent groupId, there's not too many things there

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              mavenGroupId = 'io.opentelemetry.javaagent.exporters'
          
          
            
              mavenGroupId = 'io.opentelemetry.javaagent'
